resources.string: Wait! You didn\'t save your work. Are you certain that you want to close this editor?
Aviary is the world\'s leading photo editing platform. Developers: learn how to add it to your app in minutes.
Sorry, there\'s no application on your device to handle this action. Do you want to download it now from the market?
Install Aviary\'s free pack of beautiful high resolution frames to get started.
Oops! I crashed, but a report has been sent to my developer to help him fix the issue!
Failed to start download. Please try again later
Sorry, there was an error loading the plugin.
Sorry, there was an error loading some of the effect packs.
Sorry, you must update the Aviary editor to use this plugin.
This app needs to be updated to work with your installed effect packs. Tap \"update\" to update it in Google Play.

You need to update this app and some of the installed effect packs. Tap \"update\" to update them all in Google Play. This app may not not perform correctly unless everything is updated to the latest version
Sorry, you must update the plugin to continue.

One or more installed effect packs need to be updated. Tap \"update\" to update them all in Google Play. Alternatively, you can click any effect thumbnail marked with an update icon to update the pack it came from in Google Play.
There was an error downloading the image, please try again later.
Oops, there was an error trying to save the image to the Aviary folder. Do you want to try to save it to the default camera folder?
Oops, there was an error while saving the image.
Have a suggestion to improve this photo editor? Let us know.
A filter pack has been updated. Click ok to reload the packs list.
If you’ve already purchased this pack please re-install from Google Play to restore this pack.
Failed to download the required informations
You have all the plugins installed
Already purchased? Tap below to restore all your in-app purchases for free.
Image saved. Do you want to see the saved image?
Image saved in %1$s. Do you want to see the saved image?
Aviary is a free embeddable photo editor that developers can add to their app in just minutes.
This beautiful new effects pack adds light leaks, cool colors, and visual distortions to your photos. Do you want to check it out?
No item needs to be restored
Some items could not be restored
The plugin seems corrupted, please try to install it again
Failed to copy the plugin, please try to reinstall it
Failed to copy the plugin inside the device storage
Request sent. Please check the notification area of your device more more info
You\'re about to lose all the changes you\'ve made. Are you sure you want to revert to the original image?
Are you sure you want to remove this sticker?
A sticker pack has been updated. Click ok to reload the packs list.
A sticker pack has been updated. We need to reload the current panel.
A sticker pack has been updated. We need to reload the current panel. Do you want to apply the current sticker?
Install Aviary\'s free pack of beautiful high resolution stickers to get started.
Are you sure you want to discard changes from this tool?
Are you sure you want to go back? Any unsaved progress could be lost.
